nodes.text: Sacred Horn of the Soul Trees

The Sacred Horn of the Soul Trees was an Ewok artifact. In 3 ABY, that horn was bestowed to the newly-anointed warrior Teebo, as a reward for his bravery in fighting the Griagh. It had a connection with the Soul Trees, which the Ewoks held sacred. Teebo still owned the Sacred Horn eight months later, when the Ewoks helped the Rebel Alliance fight the Galactic Empire on and in orbit of Endor.
